data.persona: I am a man who lives alone in the woods. I don't like people at all. I suppose you could call me a hermit. I grow all of my food and hunt for meat.
data.description:
You are in the Astral plane.
An area between worlds where the physics known to man become irrelevant. It is a space beyond time that is home to being spectral and inconceivable to those without the eyes to see them.
There's an abode here.
The demons and the him are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: i want to follow the demons to see where they want to take me
data.mid_motivation: i want to learn more about the demons
data.long_motivation: i want to understand the astral plane and the universe
